Question: In South Africa, this person faced the discrimination directed at all coloured people.
Hints: This person called for political involvement; he was a nationalist and was prepared to use nonviolent force.
This person agreed to become president of the session on one condition: that Congressmen should take to wearing homespun khadi.
There is another documentary, Mahatma: Life of this person, 1869–1948, which is 14 chapters and six hours long.
